name: Kids Math with Ariana
description: Kids Math with Ariana, a complete app for Kids to practice Math own self.  Math Kids features including:  Adding Quiz - Put your childs math and addition skills to the test.  Subtracting Quiz - See how much your child has improved in their mathematics skills for subtraction.  Multiplication Quiz  To increase your childs multiplication ability.  Division Quiz  Helps a lot to practice division math from 0  100.
